phrs.translation: 压缩饼干, 硬饼干, 硬面饼, 船上用语〕粗劣食品

sentences.sentence: When he tried to force the hook into a piece of hardtack, it bent.
sentences.translation: 他又试着把鱼钩穿进硬饼干里，但钩弯了。

sentences.sentence: Imagine signed interviews on "The Hardtack that Made Me an Explorer. " No, it is much better this way.
sentences.translation: 想象以下一个采访以这样的标题开始“哈塔克让我成为了探险家“，不，明显有比这好的多的方式。

sentences.sentence: If it was too wet to light a fire, they had to subsist on hardtack biscuits and cold sowbelly doused in vinegar.
sentences.translation: 要是天气太潮生不起火来，他们就只能以饼干和蘸着醋的腌肉充饥。
